title: Rendering crash when QTestFixture test cases are arranged in specific order

content.raw:
see [this inline comment](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/9da09caa63e673e028d1f678f5f27930355f4612/gazebo/gui/model/ModelEditorPalette_TEST.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default#ModelEditorPalette_TEST.hh-29)

Crash in ogre render call if the test cases are arranged in the following order:

1. test1 - test without server, i.e. `Load()` function is not called

2. test2 - test with server, i.e. `Load()` function is called

In the case above test2 segfaults. However, the two tests pass if a) test1 is replaced with a test case that has a `Load()` function call or 2) test2 is run before test1
content.html:
see this inline comment

Crash in ogre render call if the test cases are arranged in the following order:

  1. test1 - test without server, i.e. Load() function is not called

  2. test2 - test with server, i.e. Load() function is called

In the case above test2 segfaults. However, the two tests pass if a) test1 is replaced with a test case that has a Load() function call or 2) test2 is run before test1
